name: Crafting Bench Common
description: Craft basic tools, weapons, survival equipment, and accessories. Upgrade your bench to build better gear.

name: Crafting Bench Unommon
description: Craft intermediate tools, weapons, survival equipment, and accessories. Upgrade your bench to build better gear.
flavour-text: Your creative crafting skills are unmatched!

name: Crafting Bench Rare
description: Craft advanced tools, weapons, survival equipment, and accessories. Upgrade your bench to build better gear.
flavour-text: You're taking crafting to the next level!

name: Crafting Bench Epic
description: Craft expert tools, weapons, survival equipment, and accessories. Upgrade your bench to build better gear.
flavour-text: You're a big-time builder who can craft just about ANYTHING!
